title: Free High-Tech Course that WORKS - Infinity Labs
subtitle: Start your career in DevOps, Software Development, Cybersecurity & AI Research — no experience needed!
paragraph: I was an English teacher with zero software experience. Six months later, I graduated from this intensive program and started working as a DevOps engineer in the fintech industry.
paragraph2: Infinity Labs offers free, full-time training tracks in Software Development, DevOps Engineering, Cybersecurity, and AI Research. Each 20–32 week program simulates a real workplace, includes mock interviews, career coaching, and guarantees job placement with top Israeli companies—no tuition fees up front.
footer: Have questions? Want advice? Reach out! Daniel - example@gmail.com
